name: Rent's Due - BURNAWAY Interactive Story Primer
name_original: Rent's Due - BURNAWAY Interactive Story Primer
description:
Step into the boots of a Burnaway on the job. You've got a massive house fire in front of you, victims trapped inside, and some impatient creditors waiting back at home. You have important decisions to make, and not much time to make them. What takes priority in the literal heat of the moment?

A short, text-based piece of interactive fiction developed in Twine; runs directly in your browser. Exclusive content for those who join the Arnamantle email list to receive updates for the BURNAWAY Kickstarter campaign.
